data.title: SWEDEN and NORWAY - CHARLES XV and LOUISE 1850 IN AUGUS…
data.meta_description:
SWEDEN and NORWAY - CHARLES XV and LOUISE 1850

IN AUGUSTOS PRINCIPUM CAROLI ET LUDOVICAE HYMENAROS. The two figures C and L crowned within a wreath of foliage. 

R/. Faith (two hands joined) radiating above a pedestal in a rocky landscape, surmounted by a crown and adorned with a ★ charged with a G. At feet, Masonic tools. Around the rim: AUREA VENTURIS SOL PORRIGE CAUDIA LUSTRIS and at the exergue: LL. FR. MURATORES SVECI D. XIX JUNI MDCCCL. Signature P.H.L. Smooth edges.

Two silver and bronze medals commemorating the marriage of Charles XV and Louise of the Netherlands.

Ø 43,04 mm silver (38,16 g) bronze (28,68 g)

Very nice.
